favourite.article: Oh Lord we love You, we really love You!

Lord, make this my prayer: that nothing would be more attractive to me than You. That I would be Yours, and You would be mine. That there could be a joining and mingling with You and me. That You could gain what You are after, and that I could gain what I am seeking.

Lord, my life is really nothing and meaningless without You. Attract me to You everyday, don't ever let me go Lord. Whatever I am going through Lord, I am Yours and I belong to You alone. Rekindle my first love for You. I still love You!
O Lord, I really love You, love You.

This short spiritual song is awesome! It's simple in experience--telling the Lord we love Him, we're attracted and charmed by Him, and that calling on His name makes us satisfied. Yet, it is so profound in its revelation--Christ's riches are unsearchable, we're joined and mingled with Him in a divine-human incorporation, as a foretaste of the holy city, New Jerusalem. May we see that our simple moment by moment enjoyment of this unsearchably rich Christ is ushering us into this awesome incorporation that fulfills God's purpose and makes us the holy city for eternity.
Amen Lord! I love You! Thank You for saving me, coming into me, and continually indwelling me! You are so rich and bountiful and richer each day!
O Lord Jesus! I love You so much, I give You my first love. Continually supply me with Your uncreated life Divine!
O Lord, I love You. I really love You.
This song is as reviving as I first heard it five years ago and I just know it will be such for the many days to come.
O, dear Lord, how deep is Your love! Your love is beautiful to me. I am satisfied! Give my heart to love You more...
O Lord I love You, I really love You. Sometimes I do not feel it but that's the time I need to call. Calling makes one satisfied. Your name so dear and sweet.

O Lord! Please come and meet me, I am dying with You. There is nothing as sweet and pure as Your love. Plz plz plz plz plz plz never abandon me, O my Lord! The greatest of all... Plz bless me with Your name!!!!!!!! Love You.
Oh Lord, I really love You. You are so charming and pure. Without Your life we are really nothing. Amen.
Oh Lord! I love You! Without You WE ARE NOTHING! A Christian without Christ is "IAN = I Am Nothing." Lord, I am nothing, You are everything!
I love the Lord so much, each day, life's trials bring me closer to Him. I realize that God's love is so safe and pure, it is the most attracting love!!!
LORD I really love you your so gracious and compasionate i consecrate my self to you LORD I LOVE YOU!!!!!!
O LORD I LOVE YOU!!! WITH OUT YOU LORD WE CAN DO NOTHING. THANK YOU FOR EVERTHING. AMEN!
Hallelujah! Christ Love is unsearchable.Oh, Lord I love you, I really love You. His Love is so sweet and gracious.
Jesus is precious
O Lord Jesus, we really really realy love you. You are our everything Lord. Attractive and charming! Unsearchably rich!! Keep us loving you lord!! We want only you alone!! Only you!!

Lord Jesus, we, all the saints, love You. Lord, we are Your corporate wife. There is nothing to satisfy us, nothing to fill our hearts, but You dear Lord.
Grace to all the saints.
"your name's so dear and sweet, calling makes one satisfied" Lord you are so sweet! Lord you are so satisfying! Lord i really love you! Hallelujah! We love you Lord!
"I really love You." So simple, sweet, and satisfying.
I love Jesus.

I really like this song because it truly matches how I feel about the Lord! I cannot stop telling Him how much I love Him. This is my living reality and Oh how so grateful I am to brought into such enjoyment of our wonderful Triune God! He truly has ravished my heart!!!!!!! Lord I love you .. Oh Lord I love you! sister bridge in the Marianas Islands....AMEN May He bless everyone who come to Hymnal.net. This is a wonderful way for all the seekers of the Lord to keep in touch!

I enjoy the sweetness of His love to me, it is so charming, gives me unsearchable peace and blissful joy. I feel the His love to me is very strong and yet very pleasant, in such extent that I can no longer live without His presence and His love. O Lord Jesus, I really really love You. You are the most wonderful person I have ever met in my life. I want to be like You, Lord, full of mercy and tender care.
Just want to say, Lord, I love You and Lord, You know I love You. Amen.
